item.title: Jamie add a quote by neale donald walsch
item.description: "glorify who you are today, do not condemn who you were yesterday and dream of who you can be tomorrow..." -- neale donald walsch

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday. " -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Jamie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
